property.name: CardText
property.value: Whenever 1 of your opponent's attacks receive a damage or speed bonus, that bonus gets -1 (minimum 1). E: This face up attack gets +1 damage. If it deals at least double its printed damage, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Card Pool]: After you block with this card, if the blocked attack's damage is at least double its printed damage, your opponent loses 2 vitality and that attack deals no damage. E Commit 1 foundation: Shuffle this card into your deck and draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: If this attack's damage is at least half your maximum vitality, it gets -5 damage and -5 speed. F: Your next “Fire” attack this turn gets +X damage. X equals it's printed damage (maximum 5).

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this asset is destroyed during the Enhance Step, draw 1 card and this attack gets +2 or -2 damage. E Destroy: Destroy 1 of your opponent's assets.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 damage for each of your opponent's foundations with an ability that grants a damage or speed bonus on it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack's damage is 10 or more, commit 1 card in your opponent's staging area. Combo E: Choose 1 attack in your card pool that dealt at least double its printed damage. This attack gets +X damage. X equals double that attack's printed damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack's damage is 6 or more, it gets +2 speed. Combo E: This attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 damage. If it deals 6 or more damage, your next attack this turn gets Stun: 2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack's damage is 8 or more, destroy 1 of your opponent's foundations with an ability that grants a damage or speed bonus on it. E Discard 1 card: This attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 damage. If it deals 4 or more damage, your opponent loses 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your next check to play an [Evil] attack this turn gets +2. E [Your turn] Discard 1 momentum: If your face up attack's damage is at least double its printed damage, it gets Stun: 2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E Commit: This attack gets +2 damage and +2 speed. It may not receive damage or speed bonuses for the rest of this Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Flip: Before the Block Step of your opponent's non-powerful attack, reduce its damage to X. X equals your maximum vitality divided by 3 (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before your opponent's attack would receive a damage or speed bonus, that bonus gets -2 (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this face up attack's damage is at least double its printed damage, draw 1 card. R Flip: After your opponent plays an ability that gains vitality, cancel it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent plays an ability on 1 of their committed foundations, they lose 2 vitality. R Commit: After your opponent's Ready Phase, commit 1 of their foundations with an ability that grants a damage or speed bonus on it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: When committing cards to pass a check, you may commit 1 asset as if it were a foundation. First E: Name X (minimum 1) keyword abilities. If your weapon attack has those abilities, it loses them and gets +X+1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play a weapon card, ready this asset. R Commit: After an unblocked attack deals damage, your opponent's cards get +1 difficulty and +1 to their block modifiers for the rest of the turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play a weapon attack, it gets Stun: 1. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Remove: If you have 2 or more assets, add the top 2 cards of your deck to your staging area face down. Combo E: Your next weapon attack this turn gets -2 difficulty and +2 damage. Draw 1 card and discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked, draw 1 card for each of your assets.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets Powerful: 2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This attack may not be blocked by cards with keyword abilities on them. E: If this attack deals damage, for the rest of this turn whenever you play a non-safe attack, that attack gets Safe.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: The next time one of your attacks with no keyword abilities deals damage this turn, your opponent adds 1 card from their hand to their card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: If this attack deals damage, commit 1 of your opponent's foundations or assets; that card does not ready during their next Ready Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your next weapon attack with a printed difficulty of 4 or less this turn gets Multiple: 2. Combo E: This attack gets Multiple: 2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack with no keyword abilities gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block a throw attack with this card, that attack deals no damage. F [Once per turn] Discard 1 asset: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R (+4): After you play an attack, it loses all keyword abilities and gets +1 damage for each ability lost in this way. Bishamon F Remove: Add 1 asset that you could normally play from your discard pile to your staging area committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: Draw 1 card. R Commit 1 asset: After your attack with no keyword abilities deals damage, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and replace them in any order.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Remove, discard 1 momentum: Name a keyword ability. Your opponent names a keyword ability. The named abilities may not be played until the start of your next turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: When committing cards to pass a check, if you have 2 or more assets, committing this card counts as committing 2 foundations. R Flip: After 1 of your assets is destroyed by your opponent's effect, add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: If your opponent is at desperation, draw 1 card. E Remove: If your attack with no keyword abilities deals damage, your opponent adds 1 random card from their hand to their card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Gain 2 vitality or flip 1 of your opponent's foundations. E [Once per turn] (5+): Add 1 card from your discard pile to your card pool. It does not count towards progressive difficulty for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your opponent's attacks get -1 speed. R [Card Pool]: After you block with this card, gain 2 vitality. E: Gain 2 vitality. Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E: Your attack gets +1 damage for each of your opponent's face down foundations (maximum 5). R: After you attack deals damage, flip 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area or card pool, whenever a player would gain vitality for the first time in a turn, that player may draw 1 card instead. While this card is ready, you may attempt to block with it from your staging area as though it were in your hand during the Block Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If you have gained vitality this turn, flip 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your opponent's checks to play non-attack cards get -1. E: If this attack deals damage, you may choose not to clear it from your card pool during the End Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have gained vitality this turn, this attack gets +1 damage. Combo E: If this attack deals damage, destroy 1 of your opponent's face down foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your opponent must destroy 1 foundation as an additional cost to play keyword abilities. Combo E: This attack gets +3 speed. If it deals damage, you may choose not to clear it from your card pool during the End Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your other non-ranged attacks get +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If you have gained vitality this turn, this card gets -1 difficulty. E: If this attack deals damage, flip 2 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, after an attack deals damage, gain 1 vitality. E: If this attack is not blocked, you may choose not to clear it from your card pool during the End Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, gain 1 vitality whenever your opponent plays an ability on an action or asset. F Commit, discard 1 momentum: Gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After the Ready Phase, choose 1 card in your card pool. That card does not count towards progressive difficulty for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have gained vitality this turn, your attack gets +1 damage. E Flip: Destroy 1 of your opponent's face down foundations

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, non-attack cards in your card pool do not add to the progressive difficulty to play throw attacks. E Add this card to your card pool: Your non-throw attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, multiple copies get -2 damage. E(5+): Your throw attack gets +1 damage for each non-throw attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Flip: After your opponent flips 1 of their foundations, flip 1 other copy of that foundation in their staging area. R Flip: After a card is added to your card pool due to an effect, discard it from your card pool and draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy: Before your opponent's End Phase, add 1 attack from your card pool to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Add your attack to your momentum during the End Phase. E: Your kick, punch or slam attack gets +3 speed if you have 2 or more momentum. If it deals damage, your next check this turn gets +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your next check this turn gets +X. X equals your momentum times 2. E: Add 1 face up foundation to your hand. Add this card to your staging area face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play a foundation, add it to your staging area. R Commit: Before the Block Step of your opponent's attack, choose 1 momentum and reveal it. If it is an attack, you may attempt to block this attack with that card as though it were in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your next check to play a foundation this turn gets +1. R Commit: After you play a foundation, your kick, punch or slam attacks get +1 damage for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, the next time you play a foundation this turn, add it to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Add 1 of your opponent's foundations to their hand. Multiple copies of this attack also gain this ability. [Water] E Add 1 foundation to your hand: This attack gets Multiple: 1. Multiple copies of this attack get Punch.

property.value: E: Add 1 card from your hand to your momentum. E Add 1 foundation to your hand: This attack gets Powerful: 2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If the check to play this attack was modified, it gets +1 damage and +1 speed.

If there are no other copies of that card in your discard pile or staging area, add it to your staging area. F [Twice per turn] Commit 1 momentum: Add the top card of either player's discard pile to the top of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this card, draw 1 card. E Commit 1 momentum: Add this card to the top of your deck. Ready 1 momentum after this attack resolves.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Your opponent flips X foundations. X equals the number of foundations with more than 1 copy in their staging area, minus the number of foundations with more than 1 copy in your staging area (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard X momentum: Add X cards from your discard pile to your momentum. E Destroy: Your attack gets +1 damage for every 2 attacks in your discard pile. Only playable if there are no other copies of your attack in your card pool or discard pile.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +2 speed and -X damage (minimum 1). X equals the number of foundations with more than 1 copy in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Ready 1 momentum: After your opponent plays a response ability during this attack, cancel it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X damage. Your opponent's next attack this turn gets -X damage. X equals the number of cards your opponent has drawn or added to their hand due to their effects this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E: This attack gets +1 damage and +1 speed for each of your committed momentum. E: Commit 1 of either players' momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Until the start of your next turn, your opponent's attacks get -1 damage and may not receive other damage penalties. E: This attack gets +1 damage for every 2 non-unique face up foundations with exactly 1 copy in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is added to your momentum this turn, add it face up. R [Momentum] Commit: After you make a check, it gets +1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: When committing cards to pass the check to block this attack, your opponent may only commit non-unique cards with exactly 1 copy in their staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 momentum: Add this card to your momentum face up. R [Momentum] Discard this card: After your opponent plays a response ability, cancel it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play another copy of this card, add that card to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +2 damage. E Commit: This attack gets -2 damage. Only playable if you have not other copies of this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While there are more than X face up non-unique foundations with exactly 1 copy in your staging area, your hand size gets +1. X equals you character's printed hand size.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you check this card to play a non-throw attack, that attack gets Powerful: 2. E [Your turn] Destroy: Ready 1 momentum. Ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.value: E Commit: If your attack is blocked, add 1 committed momentum to your hand.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this is your first attack this turn, it gets +2 damage and +2 speed. R Commit: After your kick, punch or slam attack deals damage, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your slam attack and this card do not count towards progressive difficulty for the rest of this turn. R: Before the Damage Step of your opponent's attack, it gets -2 damage. Add 1 non-reversal slam attack from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Your next attack this turn gets +2 damage, +2 speed and ignores progressive difficulty. E Discard X cards: Draw X+1 cards. X equals the number of other cards in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block with this card, add it to your staging area. E Destroy: Both players draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this is your first attack this turn, draw 1 card. E: Your next slam attack this turn gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This attack gets -1 difficulty for each slam attack in your card pool. E: If your first attack this turn was not blocked, this attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this is your first attack this turn, it gets Stun: 2. Combo E: If you have 6 or more cards in your hand, this attack gets +2 damage and +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your first attack this turn dealt damage, this attack gets +1 speed. Combo E: This attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this is your first attack this turn and your opponent is at desperation, this attack gets +X damage. X equals your opponent's vitality minus 8 (minimum 0). E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack is blocked, add 1 card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your first attack this turn dealt damage, commit 1 card in your opponent's staging area. E Discard 1 momentum: If you have 6 or more cards in your hand, this attack gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your first attack this turn dealt damage, this attack gets +1 damage. Combo E: This attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: Your attack gets +4 damage. Your next attack this turn gets +4 speed. Only playable if this is your first attack this turn.

property.value: E Discard 1 card: Your attack gets +1 damage.

property.value: R Destroy, discard 1 momentum: After your kick, punch or slam attack deals damage, your attacks with that keyword get -2 difficulty for the rest of this turn.

property.value: E Discard 1 card: This attack gets -2 damage. E Commit, discard 1 card: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +1 speed and Stun: 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: If your slam attack is completely blocked, add 1 slam attack from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Your turn] Remove: After your opponent draws or adds 1 or more cards to their hand due to their non-character effect, they reveal their hand and add all foundations in their hand to their card pool. E: Your next 2 combo attacks this turn get -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area, after a player cycles their deck, that player may choose up to 5 attacks that were removed from the game due to that cycle and shuffle them into their deck. R Commit: After you are dealt damage by an unblocked attack, your opponent must either play a foundation or pass as their next form this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: The first reversal attack each player plays during a turn gets +2 damage. E Remove 1 other asset from the game: Draw 2 cards and remove 1 card in your hand from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E (4+): If this attack is blocked, your opponent adds 1 foundation from their discard pile to their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: The next time you remove an attack card from the game during this Enhance Step, add it to your momentum. Combo E: Remove 1 card in either player's card pool from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Your next reversal attack this turn gets -3 difficulty.

property.value: The difficulty to play this card gets -1 for each card in your opponent's card pool. Combo E Add 1 card from your opponent's card pool to their staging area face down: Add 1 of your opponent's foundations to their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Card Pool]: After you block with this card, you may attempt to play it as a reversal after this attack resolves. E: If this attack played as a reversal deals damage, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Non-reversal attacks in your card pool do not count towards the progressive difficulty to play this card. E Commit: If your attack played as a reversal deals damage, add it to your hand after it resolves.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent blocks with a non-foundation card, they lose 1 vitality. F Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your next combo attack this turn ignores progressive difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Once per turn]: After you block, look at the top 2 cards of your deck and discard any number of them.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Seal 1 of either player's assets.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Reversal attacks in your card pool do not count toward the progressive difficulty to play this card. R Commit: After you play a combo ability, your foundations and assets get -2 difficulty for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove 1 attack in your discard pile from the game: Change the zone of your attack to the zone of the removed card. Jedah E Remove: For the rest of this turn, foundations in your opponent's card pool count as 2 cards toward progressive difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Flip, add 1 reversal attack from your discard pile to your card pool: Discard 1 non-reversal attack from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you review an attack card, your non-attack cards get -1 difficulty and -1 to their block modifiers until the start of your next turn. R: After you review a non-attack card, your attacks get +1 damage and +1 speed until the start of your next turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you review this card, draw 2 additional cards during the Draw Step. You may not play non-attack cards as forms for the rest of this turn. After you discard this card due to your opponent's effect, draw 2 cards. Your opponent may not play non-attack cards for the rest of this turn. E: Your non-throw attack gets Powerful: 3.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E (4+): Your attack gets +1 speed. R: After your Ready Phase, discard 1 card. If it is a copy of either this card or a card you reviewed this turn, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Before each player's Review Step, that player may draw 1 card. R Commit: After you block with a foundation, add it to your hand. The zone of your opponent's next attack this turn is changed to the block zone of that foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you review this card, your opponent loses 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you review this card, you may unflip 1 foundation. E: If you reviewed a foundation this turn, this attack gets Powerful: 2 and Stun: 2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Discard 1 card and draw 2 cards. The discarded card is considered to have been reviewed. E Destroy 1 asset: Change this attack's zone to low. If it deals damage, for the rest of this turn whenever you play a foundation, your opponent loses 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this attack, it gets +2 damage if you reviewed a foundation this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If there is a card in your discard pile, the check to play this attack is equal to the control of the top card of your discard pile (no check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you review this card, if you have 1 or more momentum, you may add 1 other copy of it from your discard pile to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: For the rest of this turn, after you play an attack, discard 1 card and draw 1 card. The discarded card is considered to have been reviewed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you review this card, your opponent destroys 1 ready foundation. R Commit: After you discard momentum to pay the cost of a powerful ability, draw a number of cards equal to the momentum discarded (maximum 2).

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you review this card, seal 1 of your opponent's foundations. R: After your opponent adds 1 or more cards to their momentum during the Combat Phase, discard those cards and add this card to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E Commit: Name a non-attack card. Copies of the named card get -2 difficulty and -2 to their block modifiers for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you review this card, if you have 2 or more foundations that share a resource symbol with it, add it to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your powerful attack gets +2 speed. R Flip: After you play a powerful ability, your attack gets +X damage. X equals that ability's rating plus 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Remove: If you have played 4 or more non-attack cards this turn, your opponent discards their hand. Your Combat Phase ends.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you block with a foundation, your opponent's next attack this turn gets -X speed. X equals half the speed of the blocked attack (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your punch, kick or slam gets +1 speed. R Commit: At the start of your End Phase, draw 1 card. Only playable if you have played an attack this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your slam attack gets +3 speed if there is a ranged attack preceding it in your card pool. R Discard 1 momentum: After you play a ranged attack, it gets +4 damage. If the discarded momentum was a slam attack, add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy 1 foundation: After you make a check, it gets +2. E Commit 2 foundations: If your attack is not blocked, your opponent loses 5 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Your next Weapon attack this turn gets -2 difficulty and +2 damage. Draw 1 card and discard this card from your card pool. Bishamon F Remove: If you have 2 or more assets, add the top 2 cards of your deck to your staging area face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Card Pool] Discard 1 momentum: After you play this card, add it to your staging area. E Remove: Add 1 of your opponent's foundations to their hand.
